panda.net.mail.dkim

Enum Canonicalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Canonicalization>
      • panda.net.mail.dkim.Canonicalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Canonicalization>

    public enum Canonicalization
extends Enum<Canonicalization>
    Provides 'simple' and 'relaxed' canonicalization according to RFC 4871.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      RELAXED
      The 'relaxed' canonicalization algorithm.
      SIMPLE
      The 'simple' canonicalization algorithm.
